statements: DELETE FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' AND expenditure > 5000;
DELETE FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE donation_amount <= 1000.00 AND candidate_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM campaign_contributors WHERE total_donations >= 5000.00 AND contributor_name = 'Jane Smith';
DELETE FROM politician_records WHERE political_party = 'Democratic' AND election_year < 2010;
DELETE FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donation_date < '2020-01-01' AND donation_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM Contribution WHERE amount > 5000 AND contribution_date < '2022-01-01';
